alert.note: Alert for Huron; Lapeer; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; St. Clair; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Tuscola, Sanilac, Lapeer, northeastern Oakland, northwestern Macomb, northwestern St. Clair and eastern Huron Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from near Bad Axe to Clifford to near Ortonville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Thunderstorms will be near... Bad Axe and Kinde around 255 PM EDT. Marlette around 315 PM EDT. Harbor Beach, Port Hope, Dryden and Metamora around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Goodland Township, Parisville, Lynn Township, White Rock, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Juhl, Elmer, Silverwood and New Greenleaf. People attending Pine Knob Music Theatre should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
